review_title: Meaningful work, great people, poor compensation
pros: The work done at PCRS is great for the community at large, helping youth (primarily) improve their lives via specially designed programs- Substance Use, Housing, Education, Employment etc. Most staff members are very motivated by the cause and mission of the organization- friendly and diverse. Great work life balance too- staff wellness is a top priority amongst senior management.
cons: Salaries are below market rate, resulting in high turnover.
Low pay for non management staff

cons: Because of the nature of the work it can be emotional and draining. It is important to manage your wellness when you are in a caring position.
